title: Volvo
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description: On a silver background, two photographically reproduced blue and white industrial design renderings are in the upper left quadrant. The upper drawing is a view, looking down on the roof of a Volvo passenger wagon with the driver's side doors open. The lower drawing depicts an underside view of the diesal engin and connections to front wheel drive-train.  Black number provide a link between components and legend, imprinted in white at right. The word "Volvo" in large white block letters in at upper center and at the lower center of the sheet are three columns of descriptive text.
name: Poster
